info.description: Provides consumers with the ability to hit Neon services. Note that, while all the endpoints list their parameters as *query* parameters, they can be sent in the body as well (in a flat JSON object).
info.title: Neon CMS API

tags.name: callback
tags.description: Dummy endpoint to define the callback

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

200.description: The rate limits for the corresponding account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of up to 100 video IDs.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of fields to return. Can include `experiment_state`, `winner_thumbnail`, `created`, and `updated`.

200.description: A list of video statistics with the requested fields.

get.description: This will return basic thumbnail stats by `thumbnail_id` or `video_id`.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of up to 20 video IDs.

parameters.name: thumbnail_id
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of up to 100 thumbnail IDs.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of fields to return. Can include `serving_frac` (the fraction of traffic seeing this thumbnail), `ctr` (the click-through rate), `impressions` (the number of impressions), `conversions` (the number of conversions), `created`, and `updated`.

200.description: A list of thumbnail statistics with the requested fields.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: thumbnail_id
parameters.description: The ID of the thumbnail.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated string of fields to return.

200.description: A thumbnail with the requested fields.

post.summary: Upload a new thumbnail and optionally associate it with a video

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: url of the thumbnail to upload

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: video id to associate the thumbnail with

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: thumbnail_id
parameters.description: The thumbnail id to modify

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: If the thumbnail should be enabled for testing

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of video IDs.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of field names. Defaults to 'testing_enabled', 'job_id', 'url', 'state', 'publish_date', 'video_id', and 'title'.

post.summary: Submit a new video for processing.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: external_video_ref
parameters.description: The external video ID.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The video URL. Ex: `http://myvideo.mp4`.

parameters.name: callback_url
parameters.description: The URL that will be called with the result. Ex: `http://call.here`.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the video.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration of the video in seconds

parameters.name: publish_date
parameters.description: The date that the video was published.

parameters.name: custom_data
parameters.description: A dictionary of custom data about the video.

parameters.name: default_thumbnail_url
parameters.description: URL of the default thumbnail to use.

parameters.name: thumbnail_ref
parameters.description: Reference to the thumbnail object in your database.

parameters.name: n_thumbs
parameters.description: The number of thumbnails to extract.

200.description: The newly-created video. Processing will not be complete.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: testing_enabled
parameters.description: Should testing be enabled?

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Microseconds since epoch, that represents where the next search should start looking for videos. It will get videos older than this date.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Microseconds since epoch, that represents where the next search should stop looking for videos. It will get videos up to this date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum amount of videos that will be returned.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of field names. Defaults to 'testing_enabled', 'job_id', 'url', 'state', 'publish_date', 'video_id', and 'title'.

get.summary: Filter videos by search criteria, for any account in the system.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: ID of the account.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Microseconds since epoch, that represents where the next search should start looking for videos. It will get videos older than this date.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Microseconds since epoch, that represents where the next search should stop looking for videos. It will get videos up to this date.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum amount of videos that will be returned.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of field names. Defaults to 'testing_enabled', 'job_id', 'url', 'state', 'publish_date', 'video_id', and 'title'.

put.summary: This isn't a real endpoint! It's a placeholder to display the format of the callback that's sent to the `callback_url` when a video changes state.

updated.description: An ISO8601 date when the integration was last updated.

created.description: An ISO8601 date when the integration was created.

callback_url.description: URL to call after a video has been processed.

read_token.description: Brightcove token for reading for token-parameter-based authentication.

write_token.description: Brightcove token for writing for token-parameter-based authentication.

application_client_id.description: Client id for the Brightcove application for OAuth-based authentication.

application_client_secret.description: Client secret for the Brightcove application for OAuth-based authentication.

enabled.description: Specifies whether an intergration is enabled

id_field.description: Which custom field to use for the video id. If it is _reference_id the reference_id is used, if it is _bc_id the id field is used.

last_process_date.description: The last time this integration was processed through the Neon system.

uses_batch_provisioning.description: Does this integration allow batch provisioning (FTP uploads).

playlist_feed_ids.description: List of feed IDs for this integration.

publisher_id.description: The Brightcove account ID of the publisher.

uses_bc_thumbnail_api.description: Set if publisher uses Brightcove's thumbnail API on their video player page.

uses_bc_videojs_player.description: Set if publisher uses Brightcove's Video.js-based player.

uses_bc_smart_player.description: Set if publisher uses Brightcove's Flash-based Smart player.

uses_bc_gallery.description: Set if publisher uses Brightcove's gallery feature

brightcove_player.description: Configuration for a Brightcove Video.js-based player and tracking plugin

player_ref.description: Brightcove reference ID of the player.

created.description: When the player was created as ISO08601 date.

updated.description: When the player was last updated as ISO08601 date.

name.description: The Brightcove name of the player.

is_tracked.description: Determines if Neon adds its tracking plugin to the player.

publish_date.description: When Neon last successfully published the tracking plugin to the player.

published_plugin_version.description: Version of the tracking plugin last succesfully published to the player.

last_attempt_result.description: Result of the last attempt at publishing the player.

updated.description: An ISO8601 date when the integration was last updated.

created.description: An ISO8601 date when the integration was created.

video_id.description: ID of the video this thumbnail is associated with.

rank.description: Neon Labs' ranking of this image, where lower numbers are higher rankings.

frameno.description: Frame number where this image exists in the source video.

neon_score.description: Neon Labs' score for this image, where higher is better.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels.

width.description: Width of the image in pixels.

external_ref.description: ID of the asset in an external system.

type.description: 'neon' is generated by Neon Labs, 'default' is provided during the processing request, and 'customupload' is provided to Neon Labs after processing.

created.description: An ISO date for when the thumbnail was created.

updated.description: An ISO date for when the thumbnail was last updated.

created.description: An ISO8601 date when the thumbnail was created.

updated.description: An ISO8601 date when the thumbnail was last updated.

video_id.description: ID of the video associated with this thumbnail.

serving_frac.description: The fraction of traffic that is seeing this thumbnail.

conversions.description: The number of conversions for this thumbnail.

impressions.description: The number of impressions for this thumbnail.

count.description: The number of thumbnail statistics returned.

testing_enabled.description: Is A/B testing enabled for this video?

job_id.description: The job that processed this video.

serving_url.description: The URL to use when rendering an image for this video.

thumbnails.description: An array of thumbnail images associated with this video.

duration.description: The length of the video in seconds.

custom_data.description: A dictionary of custom information about the video.

updated.description: When the video was last updated.

created.description: An ISO8601 date when the video was created.

experimental_state.description: The current state of the experiment associated with this video.

updated.description: An ISO8601 date when the video was last updated.

winner_thumbnail.description: ID of the winning thumbnail, if known.

count.description: The number of video statistics returned.

job_id.description: The job that processed this video.

framenos.description: List of frame numbers identified in the video.

thumbnails.description: IDs of the thumbnails identified in the video.

serving_url.description: The URL to put on your site to show thumbnails for this video.

error.description: A string describing the error (if one occurred).

processing_state.description: State of the video being processed.

experiment_state.description: State of the A/B experiment for this video.

winner_thumbnail.description: Thumbnail ID of the best thumbnail in the experiment once it's complete.

video_count.description: The number of videos being returned.

video_posts.description: This is how many successful video creations that have happened in this time window.

max_video_posts.description: The maximum amount of video posts that can be completed in this time window.

refresh_time_video_posts.description: When video_posts will reset and start a new time window.

max_video_size.description: Max duration of the video in seconds that can be processed for this account.

video_count.description: The number of videos being returned.

next_page.description: link to next (older) page of videos

prev_page.description: link to prev (newer) page of videos

tracker_account_id.description: ID to use in the tracker code.

updated.description: An ISO8601 date when the account was last updated.

created.description: An ISO8601 date when the account was created.

integration_ids.description: An array of integration IDs associated with the account.

default_size.description: Default size of the image `[width, height]`.

staging_tracker_account_id.description: ID to use in tracking code on staging.

default_thumbnail_id.description: Default thumbnail if no others are found.

users.description: List of usernames associated to the account.
